body:
Noticed fiddling with live cluster. etcd datadir and controller/apiserver logs: 
https://console.cloud.google.com/storage/browser/devnul/etcd-crash

Etcd logs are full of:

```
2016-09-08 02:01:00.533899 I | etcdmain: etcd Version: 2.2.1
2016-09-08 02:01:00.533949 I | etcdmain: Git SHA: 75f8282
2016-09-08 02:01:00.533953 I | etcdmain: Go Version: go1.5.1
2016-09-08 02:01:00.533957 I | etcdmain: Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
2016-09-08 02:01:00.533964 I | etcdmain: setting maximum number of CPUs to 1, total number of available CPUs is 1
2016-09-08 02:01:00.534010 N | etcdmain: the server is already initialized as member before, starting as etcd member...
2016-09-08 02:01:00.534068 I | etcdmain: listening for peers on http://127.0.0.1:2380
2016-09-08 02:01:00.534088 I | etcdmain: listening for client requests on http://127.0.0.1:4001
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535059 W | snap: skipped unexpected non snapshot file db
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535071 I | etcdserver: name = default
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535075 I | etcdserver: data dir = /var/etcd/data
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535078 I | etcdserver: member dir = /var/etcd/data/member
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535082 I | etcdserver: heartbeat = 100ms
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535086 I | etcdserver: election = 1000ms
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535089 I | etcdserver: snapshot count = 10000
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535097 I | etcdserver: advertise client URLs = http://127.0.0.1:4001
2016-09-08 02:01:00.535127 W | wal: ignored file 0.tmp in wal
panic: runtime error: makeslice: len out of range

goroutine 1 [running]:
github.com/coreos/etcd/wal.(*decoder).decode(0xc820198630, 0xc820186178, 0x0, 0x0)
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/wal/decoder.go:55 +0x142
github.com/coreos/etcd/wal.(*WAL).ReadAll(0xc820131d40, 0xc820194a60, 0x15, 0x20, 0x2, 0xce2a822cea30bfca, 0x15b0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/wal/wal.go:238 +0x442
github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdserver.readWAL(0xc820194960, 0x19, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc820131d40, 0xc820191750, 0x5, ...)
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdserver/storage.go:84 +0x227
github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdserver.restartNode(0xc82013a0e0, 0x0, 0x7f74ef1a1028, 0xc8200b1400, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdserver/raft.go:286 +0xff
github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdserver.NewServer(0xc82013a0e0, 0xc82013a100, 0x0, 0x0)
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdserver/server.go:288 +0x322d
github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdmain.startEtcd(0xc8200fa6c0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdmain/etcd.go:287 +0x1a92
github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdmain.Main()
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/etcdmain/etcd.go:117 +0x1e26
main.main()
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/main.go:29 +0x14

goroutine 12 [chan receive]:
github.com/coreos/etcd/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/golang/glog.(*loggingT).flushDaemon(0x11b4240)
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/golang/glog/glog.go:879 +0x67
created by github.com/coreos/etcd/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/golang/glog.init.1
    /home/vagrant/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/release/etcd/gopath/src/github.com/coreos/etcd/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/golang/glog/glog.go:410 +0x297

goroutine 32 [syscall]:
os/signal.loop()
    /usr/local/go/src/os/signal/signal_unix.go:22 +0x18
created by os/signal.init.1
    /usr/local/go/src/os/signal/signal_unix.go:28 +0x37
2016-09-08 02:01:02.244576 I | etcdmain: etcd Version: 2.2.1
2016-09-08 02:01:02.249642 I | etcdmain: Git SHA: 75f8282
2016-09-08 02:01:02.249658 I | etcdmain: Go Version: go1.5.1
2016-09-08 02:01:02.249662 I | etcdmain: Go OS/Arch: linux/amd64
2016-09-08 02:01:02.249670 I | etcdmain: setting maximum number of CPUs to 1, total number of available CPUs is 1
```

@kubernetes/sig-scalability @wojtek-t 
we probably at least want to triage for 1.4 so marking as p0.

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

title: Etcd3 -> etcd 2 rollback: etcd crashes
